pages.text: The Void Talisman provides immunity from falling into the void.  Player is teleported to the top of the dimension.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_normal)Normal Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_warrior)Force of Warrior$(/l).
